description: The requirement is for the purchase of cardiovascular training and resistance training equipment for the new Tactical Training Center (TTC) as well as for certain detachments within C Division in Quebec.",
full_summary:
================================

# Gym Equipment Tender

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 202302426
* **Title**:
	+ English: Gym Equipment
	+ French: Equipement de Gym
* **Reference Number**: cb-84-50079925
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-04
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-15T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-16
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-31

## Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals for the supply of cardiovascular training and resistance training equipment for the new Tactical Training Center (TTC) and certain detachments within C Division in Quebec.

## Tender Status

The tender is **Expired**.

## Important Links

* [Amendment to Solicitation Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33422/rcmp_solicitation_amendment_-en_0.pdf)
* [Tender Description Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33422/ddp-equipement-gym-en_a23.pdf)

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Elie El Khouri
* **Email**: elie.elkhouri@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (438) 945-8118
* **Address**: 4225 Dorchester West, Westmount, Québec, H3z 1v5, Canada

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Regions of Delivery

* Canada
